name: Grapple Hook Game Demo
description:
I wanted to make a grappling hook game. I made the mechanics for it. Buut I ran out of ideas there. Here's a demo just showing off the gameplay.

Oh I also added a museum room for the assets I made for this game.

  • Move with WASD, Space
  • Right click to grapple
  • Alt + F4 to exit because I didn't add an exit button
  • P to return to lobby
